column4: Flash makes my music player "skip"... like this: "The space be-be-be-be-between...."
This only happens when there's a website open w/ flash funning
and I can also see the flash video freeze at the same time
The music is coming from Rhythmbox.
Adobe keeps finding new reasons for me to hate them.
have you tried any other players , like VLC
Flash would be making my audio driver freeze?
Does it with VLC as well
it plays flv files in the browser
download a youtube file , and play it with VLC c
what are you trying to learn from that?
to isolate the problem , whether flash plays ok without a browser
well, it's definitely not the file itself. Does VLC use Adobe's decoders to play .flvs?
I think vlc uses it's own flash yes
the best place to place the libflashplyer.so file is in /usr/lib/mozilla/plugins , in my experirnce
